revision.text: {{also|yasui}} ==English== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|ja|安井}} or {{m|ja|安居|tr=Yasui}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Yasuis}} # {{surname|en|from=Japanese}}. #* '''2012''', Karen Latchana Kenney, ''Korematsu v. the United States: World War II Japanese-American Internment Camps'', ABDO Publishing Company, [https://books.google.com/books?id=py5XRHB6YJwC&pg=PA89&dq=Minoru+Yasui#v=onepage&q=Minoru%20Yasui&f=false 89]: #*: Minoru '''Yasui''' was a trained army officer with a legal education who worked in the Japanese consular office. ---- ==Japanese== ===Romanization=== {{ja-romaji}} # {{ja-romanization of|やすい}}
